TopicTitle: HELP for texture for KSI and an other mod (in work)

Articles.Content:
Hello, I am Oursshinigami for the project Kerbal Science Innovation. I write this because I need of an other personne for the texture (temporary or not). I have lot of works with my studies (first years in the university ) and I m in a periode of test. I can't work totaly on those 2 mods and like you know, I am not really good in texture.

 

PLEASE HELP ME.

 

Thanks to have read this help message.
